price: Dan seperti itulah, telah Kami adakan bagi tiap-tiap nabi, musuh dari orang-orang yang berdosa. Dan cukuplah Tuhan-mu menjadi pemberi petunjuk dan penolong.
arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ جَعَلۡنَا لِكُلِّ نَبِيٍّ عَدُوّٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَۗ وَكَفَىٰ بِرَبِّكَ هَادِيٗا وَنَصِيرٗا

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wakadhālika jaʿalnā likulli nabiyyin ʿaduwwan mina al-muj'rimīna wakafā birabbika hādiyan wanaṣīran
